item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, my name is Kenta and I’m a Software Engineering student studying at the University of Alberta. My passion is programming and I have a strong interest in large scale infrastructure. Previously, I had the opportunity to work on the Valorant core services team at Riot Games. There, I had the fantastic opportunity to work on the back-end services that Valorant relies on for its online features. I also worked at Demonware Inc.
